title: Ticket #2235: condor_ssh_to_job does not work on fedora 14
description:
This can be reproduced on the NMI pool: 

slot2@nmi-v029.batlab.cs.wisc.edu: condor_ssh_to_job_sshd_setup failed: Failed to create ssh key /home/condor/execute/dir_13411/.condor_ssh_to_job_1/sshkey with command "/usr/bin/ssh-keygen" "-N" "" "-C" "" "-q" "-f" "/home/condor/execute/dir_13411/.condor_ssh_to_job_1/sshkey" "-t" "rsa"
remarks:
2011-Sep-12 15:47:54 by tstclair:
eval for removal, as f14 goes EOL in november

2011-Sep-12 17:32:59 by danb:
I don't think I am going to get to this. It seems really low priority based on all the information I have. I am closing this ticket until we learn otherwise.
creator: kronenfe
